author: rpopma
msg: reverted back AppenderRef to appender-ref in log4j-1.2 and logback config files (and some log4j2 performance test config files), also fixed closing </Configuration> tag to lower-case </configuration> in logback config files

msg: Replaced 'document.write()' with 'document.writeln()' to add newlines at every line end
